Room.Name: Secret Quick Car Transporter
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the elven quick car transporters. You appear to have come to a dead end in the caves. Looks like you're somewhere in the mountains.
Room.LongDescription: You've found an old quick car terminal. There's a car here for you to use but you're not sure if it'll get you anywhere. The quick cars were created by the elves to get around the mountains quickly and efficiently.
